description: A premium and technical shoe that combines the support of a hiking boot with the agility of a trail running shoe designed for off-road terrain or a long day of city sightseeing. Whatever you pick, it doesn’t matter to the TX Hike GTX. You can do it all and you will end the day with happy feet and mind, thanks to the wide comfort fit and sustainably conscious materials.
name: La Sportiva TX Hike GTX - Mens
